title: (x) New(ish) NBC identity tech sans - Klavika {Florian}
content:
I’m sure this has been discussed previously, and I’m also assuming this is probably a custom typeface...but I just wanted to see if anyone could suggest something similar out there.

Here are a few links:

[http://www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/FallPreview08\_300x80.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122031739/http:/www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/FallPreview08_300x80.jpg "http://www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/FallPreview08\_300x80.jpg")  
 [http://www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/titles/in\_development.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122031739/http:/www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/titles/in_development.jpg "http://www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/titles/in\_development.jpg")  
 [http://www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/titles/show\_title\_americas\_jobs.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122031739/http:/www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/titles/show_title_americas_jobs.jpg "http://www.nbc.com/Primetime/images/titles/show\_title\_americas\_jobs.jpg")

Thanks for any help!

 [‹ (x) Johnny Cupcakes' new logo - custom lettering {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122031739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48014 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Odd but beautiful italic serif "selling false" - Freight Big/Display {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122031739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47991 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zmc08

comments.content:
[http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/klavika/klavika06.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122031739/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/klavika/klavika06.html "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/klavika/klavika06.html")

Good call Florian...I think that definitely settles it.

Thanks!
